mean_cn: v.乞求，恳求给予（帮助或金钱）
mean_en: to ask somebody for something, such as support, money or information; to try to get something or persuade somebody to do something
sentence: Now, he had no house or job, he had to solicit help from strangers to survive.
sentence_trans: 如今，他没有了房子也没有了工作，他不得不向路人乞讨来维持生存。
